sentences.english: The Anthrax Gamma might make us a little stronger.
sentences.chinese: 炭疽菌伽瑪將讓我們更強大一點。

sentences.english: When Victor's mother died from anthrax, Fredy came along and adopted him.
sentences.chinese: 維克多的媽媽得炭疽病死後，佛雷迪就收養了他。

sentences.english: Such a discovery will speed the development of new drugs and vaccines to fight or prevent anthrax infection, and advance the understanding of bacterial infection.
sentences.chinese: 這個發現還能加速預防或治療炭疽熱的藥物的研發。

sentences.english: Oxytetracycline is effective against b anthracis .
sentences.chinese: 土黴素對炭疽桿菌是有效的。

sentences.english: Medical authorities are also stocking up on antibiotics20 that can be used to treat anthrax.
sentences.chinese: 醫療部門也在收集用於治療炭疽熱的抗菌素。

sentences.english: This is pulmonary anthrax, which usually causes death.
sentences.chinese: 這種呼吸性炭疽熱細菌的感染通常是致命的。

sentences.english: The study on age-related disease resistance of mango leaves to Colletotrichum gloeosporioides Penz.
sentences.chinese: 研究了芒果葉片生化特性與炭疽病發生之間的關係。

sentences.english: Bio_terrorism has never attracted so much attention around the world before anthrax spore attack in U.
sentences.chinese: 美國炭疽芽孢恐怖事件的發生引起了全球的廣泛關注。

sentences.english: The technology can also be used to remove Bacillus anthracis spores from egg whites.
sentences.chinese: 該技術也可以被用於去除蛋白上的炭疽芽孢桿菌。

sentences.english: Persimmon anthracnose is one of the major diseases attacking persimmon trees in Shangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 柿炭疽病是陝西商洛柿樹的主要病害之一。

sentences.english: That is the one of the sad lessons of the anthrax attacks.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們從炭疽菌襲擊中得出的令人沮喪的教訓之一。

sentences.english: The anthracnose infected soil also had severe acid rot.
sentences.chinese: 炭疽病嚴重的地塊酸腐病也嚴重。

sentences.english: The work may also be important for combating engineered strains of anthrax and plague.
sentences.chinese: 這項工作也可用於防治炭疽工程菌和鼠疫。

sentences.english: Extensive replication in the blood is generally what kills patients who succumb to anthrax .
sentences.chinese: 血液內大量繁殖的細菌通常是炭疽病致死的主因。

sentences.english: Tolerant to fusarium wilt and anthracnose.
